model

Interface GameListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardPrinter, ConsoleController, Controller, DumbAI, MinMaxAI, RandomAI, SmartAI

    public interface GameListener
    A GameListener is any object that wants to respond whenever a Game object changes.
    See Also:
    Game, Game.addListener(model.GameListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameChanged(Game g)
      Respond appropriately to changes in the game g.

    • Method Detail

      • gameChanged

        void gameChanged(Game g)
        Respond appropriately to changes in the game g.
